msItem.title: Sörla saga sterka
msItem.incipit: I þann tyma hefst saga þessi, er Halldan kongur Brönufostre stirde Sviþiod
msItem.explicit: hafe orded auded barna epter sig edur eige
msItem.finalRubric: ok lykur hier nu Sogunne af Sorla hinum sterka ok hans afreks vorkum

filiation.p: Copied from an unknown manuscript (possibly Westin 87 in Uppsala?) owned by B. Thorlacius (cf. note on fol. 2r)

msItem.title: Hálfs saga og Hálfsrekka
msItem.incipit: Augnvalldr er kongr nemndr, er reþ fyri Rogalandi
msItem.explicit: Yta[?] hiet dottir hans ok er frá henne komit micit afspringi
msItem.note: Separate title page (fol. 33) reads: Saga af Hálfi kongi oc reckom hans. (Efter et haandskrift som tilhörer prof. Thorlaciws. skrevet af Schaldemose. 1816.
Appears to be a condensed version of the saga?

filiation.p: Copied from an unknown manuscript (Possibly Westin 81 in Uppsala?) owned by B. Thorlacius (cf. note on fol. 2r)

support.watermark: Coat of arms with beehive [Honig & Zoonen] partially visible on fol. 32. Other watermarks by same paper maker visible throughout.

foliation.p: Paginated 1-54, 1-14 in upper margins. Fol. 1 blank except for annotation on verso. Fols. 30-32 blank.

additions.p: Table of contents added to fol. 1v: þesse book hefur inne að hallda epterfilgiande Sauge. 1. Saugo af Sorla sterka 2. af Halfe ok reckom hans. Annotations at foot of title page (2r): (afskreven efter et haandskrift som tilhörer hr professor Thorlaciws, af Schaldemose, Nykiöping og Falster. 1816. Foreret Skolens bibliothek af hr. Schaldemose

binding.p: Half-calf with contemporary marbled (black, blue, rose and orange) boards. Red and gold sticker with titles, SAGAN AF SORLA STERKA OK HALFI, affixed to front cover. Library sticker from Nykøbing Cathedral School affixed to foot of spine. Raised bands and gilt stripes on spine.

provenance.p: Given as a gift to the Nykøbing Katedralskole in 1816 by Frederik Schaldemose. Acquired from the school by the AMS in April 2007 as a gift. Library sticker from the school on the foot of the spine.
